> -----Original Message-----
> From: career_store [mailto:career_store@...] 
> Sent: Friday, March 05, 2004 7:34 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Generation of Junit reports fail during 
> junit tests using ant.
> 
> 
> I am running a number of Junit testcase from ant and all the tests 
> seem to fail ...
> 
> [junitreport] [Fatal Error] TEST- 
> com.test.cvt.DataStoreProfileMaxPurgeTransactio
> nSizeTest.xml:1:1: Premature end of file ...
> On opening each of the xml files, I found out that each one 
> was empty. Any ideas?
> 

I was getting similar results when the junut taks was getting an out of
memory error. Fixed this with a: <jvmarg value="-Xmx400m"/> in the junit
target.

hth
